name: hypest-light
description: A light, native and refined UI theme for Atom
author: Hector Simpson (https://hector.me)

vibrancy.title: Enable vibrancy
vibrancy.description: Enables tranclucency effects for parts of the window.

syntaxTheme.title: Match syntax theme
syntaxTheme.description: Matches the text editor styles to your syntax theme.

tabCloseButton.title: Tab close button position
tabCloseButton.description: Choose the position of the close button shown in tabs.

scrollbars.title: Theme scrollbars
scrollbars.description: Scrollbars will always be visible when themed.

hideDockButtons.title: Hide dock toggle buttons
hideDockButtons.description: Showing and hidings docks will require keyboard shortcuts once enabled.
